t: Brand - BCBG Max Azria | Current Boutique
s: Max Azria is a French fashion designer based in LA. He is probably most famous for his BCBG women's clothing brand. His styles are frequently seen on celebs and in many high-end department stores. His collections embody youthful sophistication.
